name: Odorcide Laundry Odor Eliminator Concentrate – Pet Odor Eliminator for Strong Odors – Pet Smell & Urine Odor Eliminator for Clothes – Laundry Odor Neutralizer w/Safe, Non-Enzymatic Formula (32 oz)
short_description: Use what Your Vet Uses: Thornell is an excellent provider of pet odor eliminator for home and laundry products to the veterinary industry in North America. Use what the pros use! This powerful dog and cat odor eliminator concentrate for laundry can be used safely on towels, bedding, blankets, clothing, and all other machine-washable items.

Tough on Strong Odors: Use this pet odor remover laundry concentrate to permanently and immediately remove odors from the first application, saving you time and money. This concentrated laundry deodorizer for clothes penetrates the source of the odor whereas other pet deodorizers for home and laundry only treat surface problems.

Easy to Use & Cost Efficient: Add L.O.E. animal odor eliminator clothes additive to the pre-soak or auto-soak cycle, or directly with the detergent. For moderate odors, use only ½ oz per load. Our 32 oz bottle of dog and cat smell eliminator is good for 64 loads of laundry!

Not an Enzyme, Not a Mask: Our pet smell odor eliminator concentrate features a unique non-enzymatic formula that works regardless of what application you have used before. Odorcide L.O.E works where other odor absorbers for home laundry products haven’t and won’t.

Safe for Small Pets & Children: No need to fear, pets and children can safely be around anything treated with L.O.E. pet smell and cat urine odor eliminator immediately after use. Our concentrated deodorizer odor eliminator is non-toxic, non-irritating, non-carcinogenic, and biodegradable.

name: Lysol Laundry Sanitizer Additive, Crisp Linen, 2X90oz
short_description: Kills 99.9% of bacteria like Staphylococcus Aureus and Klebsiella pneumonia, simply add to rinse cycle
Contains 0% bleach, works even in cold water
Gentle on most fabrics including whites & colors
Works in all standard and HE machines
Suitable for children's clothes, gym clothes, underwear, towels, bedding & delicates
product_description: Our clothes are in constant contact with bacteria throughout our day-to-day activities, for example through contact with contaminated surfaces, other people and our own bodies. Bacteria can spread from one fabric to another in the laundry basket, from the washing-machine drum to the next load. Some of these bacteria can survive following the wash cycle. When it comes to certain laundry loads such as children's clothes or sportswear, you want to eliminate bacteria that may cause illnesses and create lingering bad smells. But detergents alone don't actually kill all bacteria. Introducing Lysol Laundry Sanitizer, an additive specially designed to kill 99.9% of bacteria in laundry. Simply add Lysol Laundry Sanitizer to your rinse cycle. It does not contain any chlorine bleach and even works in cold water so is safe to use on most fabrics including whites, colors and darks.

name: Lysol Tough Odor Eliminator Laundry Sanitizer Additive, Sanitizing Liquid for Gym Clothes and Activewear, 0% Bleach, Eliminates Odor Causing Bacteria, 90oz
short_description: LAUNDRY DETERGENT ADDITIVE: Add Lysol Laundry Sanitizer to every wash, in the fabric softener drawer, to sanitize and deodorize smelly laundry. Lysol Laundry Sanitizer kills many bad odors that detergents leave behind.

COLOR SAFE BLEACH ALTERNATIVE: Lysol Laundry Sanitizer is a bleach alternative that effectively kills 99.9% of bacteria, without the harshness of bleach. It's gentle on fabrics, effective in cold water, and is safe to use on colors and whites.

LYSOL LAUNDRY SANITIZER: Better than in-wash scent boosters that just mask bad odors. Lysol Laundry Sanitizer kills the odor causing bacteria that laundry detergents alone can leave behind, even in cold water Can be used in standard and HE machines.

ODOR ELIMINATOR FOR STRONG ODOR: Say goodbye to stubborn odors with Lysol Laundry Sanitizer, an advanced formula designed to act as an effective odor eliminator for even the toughest smells, leaving your clothes smelling fresh after every wash.

HOUSEHOLD ESSENTIALS and CLEANING SUPPLIES: Lysol is a leader in disinfection. Shop our range of household cleaning supplies including disinfectant wipes, toilet bowl cleaners, air sanitizers, and disinfectant sprays. The best protection is prevention
Kills 99.9% of Staphylococcus aureus and Klebsiella pneumonia on laundry.
product_description: Keep your clothes smelling fresh with Lysol Laundry Sanitizer additive. This scented laundry additive eliminates 99.9% of bacteria that regular laundry detergent may leave behind. Perfect for households with kids, athletes, or anyone who wants fresh smelling, sanitized laundry. The bleach-free formula is safe for use on most fabrics, including whites, colors, and darks, and works effectively, even in cold water. The Crisp Linen scent leaves your clothes smelling fresh and clean with a light, pleasant aroma. Lysol Laundry Sanitizer is versatile and can be added to your rinse cycle for an extra layer of protection for odor causing bacteria. It is suitable for both standard and high-efficiency (HE) washing machines. The large 90oz bottle ensures long-lasting use, making it perfect for busy households. You'll love its ability to tackle tough odors from sports gear, towels, and more, ensuring a fresh smell after every wash. This product acts as an effective odor eliminator for strong odors, making it ideal for the laundry room. Lysol Laundry Sanitizer is not just limited to laundry, it can also be used as a shoe odor elimination solution to freshen up athletic shoes when used as directed. From the trusted makers of Lysol disinfectant spray and Lysol disinfectant products, this laundry sanitizer ensures high-quality in-wash sanitization. The 90oz bottle is efficient for frequent use, making it a staple in any household laundry routine. It is also pairs well with laundry detergent sheets, laundry pods, and laundry detergent pods, and with other laundry products such as laundry beads, and laundry scent boosters. Upgrade your laundry routine with Lysol Laundry Sanitizer Additive in Crisp Linen. Order now for a fresher wash every time! ***Kills 99.9% of Staphylococcus aureus and Klebsiella pneumonia on laundry at 21 degrees Celsius.

HOW TO USE: Add your favorite ARM & HAMMER Laundry Detergent and ARM & HAMMER In-Wash Scent Booster to wash drum before adding laundry; next, pour ARM & HAMMER Fabric Rinse directly into the fabric softener dispenser
RELIABLE AND EFFICIENT: For generations of families, ARM & HAMMER has provided trustworthy, cost-effective, and high-quality laundry care solutions you can count on
product_description: ARM & HAMMER Odor Blasters Deep Rinse & Revitalize Fabric Rinse, Fresh Escape Scent is your go-to solution for long-lasting freshness and powerful odor elimination (1). This value-packed rinse and laundry odor eliminator contains 5X the odor-fighting ingredients (2). It removes stubborn odors like musty towels, sweat, and body odors trapped deep in fibers, and rinses away clean with no residue after one wash. Powered by enhanced fragrance technology, this laundry rinse revitalizes your clothes with a Fresh Escape scent. This bottle of laundry refresher is safe for all washable fabrics and works with both high-efficiency (HE) and traditional washing machines even in cold water. Add your usual ARM & HAMMER Laundry Detergent and In-Wash Scent Booster to the wash drum before adding your laundry. Next, pour rinse directly into the fabric softener dispenser. Use 2 fl oz (¼ cup) for regular loads, and use more for larger loads. ARM & HAMMER provides high-quality laundry care products at a great value. For a complete laundry routine, pair ARM & HAMMER Odor Blasters Deep Rinse & Revitalize Fabric Rinse with ARM & HAMMER Laundry Detergent and favorite ARM & HAMMER In-Wash Scent Booster. (1) sweat, body odor, and musty odors (2) vs. leading value liquid detergent per load
